data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn a mekamfo woɔ,
na amumuyɛfoɔ ne nkontompofoɔ
Wɔde nitansɛm atwa me ho ahyia
Wɔka nsɛm to me so de tua me nnamfoyɛ so ka,
Wɔde bɔne tua me papayɛ so ka,
Ma onipa bɔne bi nsɔre ntia no;
Wɔdi nʼasɛm a, ma ɔnni fɔ,
Ma ne nkwa nna nyɛ kakraa bi;
Ma ne mma nyɛ nwisiaa
Ma ne mma nkyinkyini nsrɛsrɛ adeɛ;
Ma ɔdefirifoɔ bi mfa deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa;
Mma obiara nhunu no mmɔbɔ
Ma nʼase nhye,
Ma wɔnkae nʼagyanom nnebɔne wɔ Awurade anim;
Wɔn bɔne nyinaa nka Awurade anim,
Ɛfiri sɛ wannwene da sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adɔeɛ,
Nʼani gyee sɛ ɔbɛdome
Ɔhyɛɛ nnome sɛ atadeɛ;
Ma ɛnyɛ sɛ atadeɛ a ɛkyekyere ne ho,
Ma yei nyɛ Awurade akatua a ɔde ma me kwaadubɔfoɔ,
Nanso, wo Ao Asafo Awurade,
Ɛfiri sɛ meyɛ ohiani ne deɛ onnibie,
Metwam sɛ anwummerɛ sunsumma;
Abuadadie ama me kotodwe mu agogo;
Mayɛ aseredeɛ ama wɔn a wɔbɔ me soboɔ;
Boa me, Ao Awurade me Onyankopɔn;
Ma wɔnhunu sɛ ɛyɛ wo nsa,
Wɔbɛdome, nanso wobɛhyira;
Animguaseɛ bɛdura mʼatamfoɔ ho;
Mede mʼano bɛma Awurade so ayɛ no kɛseɛ;
Ɛfiri sɛ, ɔgyina onnibie nsa nifa so
